lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal slammed the British media on Thursday for 'awful and horrible' stories about his future and said the club's support, while welcome, had put more pressure on him.

headline.print_headline: I've Been Sacked by 'Awful' Media Three Times, Says Van Gaal
headline.main: I've Been Sacked by 'Awful' Media Three Times, Says Van Gaal

snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal slammed the British media on Thursday for 'awful and horrible' stories about his future and said the club's support, while welcome, had put more pressure on him....
